name: Christian
description: Full-stack developer specializing in React, React Native, and backend development with Node.js and NestJS. Passionate about delivering clean, user-friendly, and efficient applications.

history.description: Developed the Uglycash application using React Native, focusing on financial flows, card integration, UI consistency, multilingual support, and backend collaboration.
responsabilities: Implemented and maintained fiat money inflow and outflow ramps
Developed flows for card integration (Tribe, Treasury Prime)
Collaborated on a Design System for UI scalability
Built 'request money' and 'send money' flows, payment links, and deep linking
Managed feature flags and animations with Reanimated
Implemented internationalization (i18n) for multi-language support
Created cashback program and activity tracking features
Contributed to backend refactor and created mock APIs

history.description: Migrated mobile app from JS to TS, implemented crypto flows, rebranding changes, and stablecoin ramps. Worked on UI and investment features.
responsabilities: Migrated entire React Native app from JavaScript to TypeScript
Integrated Fireblocks for crypto (BTC, ETH) transactions
Created investment section and managed fiat ramps
Participated in rebranding and Tribe card integration
Focused on front-end UI design and flow optimization

history.description: Worked on React Native app with Expo, implemented fiat ramps, cashback programs and optimized transactional UX.
responsabilities: Implemented new features and refactored code in React Native (Expo)
Managed incoming and outgoing fiat money flows
Developed card functionality including cashback
Focused on intuitive interface design and secure transactions

history.description: Worked on micro frontends and full-stack applications using Angular, React, .NET Core, and Oracle DB.
responsabilities: Developed micro frontends for internal corporate portal
Built applications with Angular, React, .NET Core, Oracle
Improved internal reporting and liquidation tools
Ensured code coverage and software maintainability

history.description: Worked on Tango POS system using .NET Framework, REST APIs and desktop integrations.
responsabilities: Developed Tango POS desktop system using .NET Framework, WPF, MVVM
Created REST services for integration with web systems
Used Visual Studio, SQL Server, TFS and TortoiseGit
